amendment.description: An amendment to increase funding for the Community Planning and Development- HOME Investment Partnerships by $293 million and strikes the last two provisos in the Community Planning and Development-HOME Investment Partnerships Program.

action.text: Mr. Diaz-Balart raised a point of order against the Green, Al amendment (A034). Mr. Diaz-Balart stated that the amendment seeks to cause a net increase in budget authority in violation of the provisions of H. Res. 5. The Chair sustained the point of order.
Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Green, Al.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Green, Al.
